metadata.title: CVE-2019-19709 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: MediaWiki through 1.33.1 allows attackers to bypass the Title_blacklistprotection mechanism by starting with an arbitrary title, establishing anon-resolvable redirect for the associated page, and using redirect=1 inthe action API when editing that page.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
